official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to present on behalf of the Congress a specially struck gold medal to the family of Sam Rayburn.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of Congress, to present a gold medal to the family of Sam Rayburn in recognition of his accomplishments as a legislator and public official. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to coin duplicates of such medal in gold, silver, and bronze for public sale. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to present on behalf of the Congress a specially struck gold medal to the family of Sam Rayburn.
